title: 167: How We Got the Book of Common Prayer
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The Book of Common Prayer is for those of us who don't always know what to say. So . . . all of us. Thomas gives us a little history, then a quick rundown of the book.
itunes:author: By Thomas Cranmer, Thomas Cramer, and Cosmo Cramer
itunes:subtitle: Cosmo. That's it.
